segments.text: I notice the woman drying that plate like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even seem to notice the water all around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just ignoring it or if she’s really that distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to be shocked when she finally looks up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger, and someone is going to slip soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But right now, she’s completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR
